AppSettings.Secret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOUR OWN SECRET, IT CAN BE ANY STRING CLIENT
AppSettings.ClientSecret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOUR OWN SECRET, IT CAN BE ANY STRING CLIENT
AppSettings.UserSecret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOUR OWN SECRET, IT CAN BE ANY STRING USER
AppSettings.EmailConfirmationSecret: THIS WILL BE USED FOR EMAIL CONFIRMATION TOKEN GENERATION
AppSettings.RecoverPasswordSecret: THIS WILL BE USED FOR EMAIL RECOVER PASSWORD TOKEN GENERATION
AppSettings.InviteUserSecret: THIS WILL BE USED FOR INVITE USER TOKEN GENERATION
